entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Winnipeg (The Forks)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winnipeg - The Forks 11:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -22.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -26.8°C
Wind: N 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
